name: Employee Recycling Center
description: Abandoned by your co-workers after a terrible accident in the factory, you are trapped. Interact with your environment, solve puzzles and unlock up to 500 achievements in this new adventure for PC and Virtual Reality Headsets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (2001) and above or AMD Processors after 2003 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card that supports Direct X 9 or above. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9 sound device Additional Notes: For VR only: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
recommended_requirements: Additional Notes: For VR only: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
